      • createMCQChoice

        public void createMCQChoice(java.util.List<MCQChoice> MCQChoiceList,
                            MCQQuestion question)
                     throws java.sql.SQLException,
                            CreateFailedException

        Creates an MCQ Choice in the database

        If a problem occurs throws a CreateFailedException

        Takes a list of the mcq choices for a question

        usage example : MCQChoiceJDBCDAO mcqchoicedao = new ... try {mcqchoicedao.createMCQChoice(MCQChoiceList, QuestionInstance)}; catch(CreateFailed e)
        Parameters:
        MCQChoiceList - List of the MCQ choices that is created in the MCQCHOICE table
        question - The MCQQuestion that is associated with the choices
        Throws:
        CreateFailedException - The exception that is thrown when the choices are not created
        java.sql.SQLException

      • getMCQChoiceByID

        public java.util.List<MCQChoice> getMCQChoiceByID(MCQQuestion question)
                                           throws java.sql.SQLException,
                                                  ReadFailedException

        Gets the list of MCQ choices for an MCQ question

        Gets the MCQ choice list for a question when a student takes a quiz with MCQ Question

        If a problem occurs throws a ReadFailedException

        usage example : MCQChoiceJDBCDAO mcqquestiondao = new ... try {mcqchoicedao.getMCQChoiceByID(QuestionInstane)} catch(ReadFailed e)
        Parameters:
        question - The MCQ question that is associated with the choicelist
        Returns:
        mcqchoicelist returns the list of MCQ choices associated with the MCQ question
        Throws:
        ReadFailedException - The exception that is thrown when a problem occurs in getting the choicelist
        java.sql.SQLException

      • deleteMCQChoiceByQuestionID

        public void deleteMCQChoiceByQuestionID(MCQQuestion question)
                                 throws java.sql.SQLException,
                                        DeleteFailedException

        Deletes the MCQ Choices of an MCQ question

        This method is called when an MCQ question is deleted

        When an MCQ question is deleted, all the MCQ choices associated with the MCQ question are deleted to preserve the referential integrity

        If a problem occurs throws the DeleteFailedException

        usage example : MCQChoiceJDBCDAO mcqchoicedao = new ... try{ mcqchoicedao.deleteMCQChoiceByQuestionID(MCQQuestionInstance)} ; catch(DeleteFailed e)
        Parameters:
        question - Question for which the choices are deleted
        Throws:
        DeleteFailedException - The exception that is thrown when the choices are not deleted
        java.sql.SQLException
